description.raw:
* Add save models logic to logging such that replay does not depend on downloading models

* Add default behaviour to record with models as disabled, save model file only when --record_with_model added to the argument

* Use GetDefaultTestPath() for gazebo7

* Fix tests and not breaking ABI

* Mark new Start function as the one that is expected to be deprecated and don't give default value to _recordWithModel

* style tweaks

* fix abs path, model insertion, saving files, add test

* exists

* only print many bullet console warnings one time

* Creating branch to investigate ODE Revolute Joint initialization issue

* Creating fixes and tests for issue 2430

* Resolve a few code check complaints

* Fixes based on reviewer feedback

* changelog

* add expectations on return value of SetPosition, add test case for super-large angles with logic for bullet

* add ssao plugin and material

* add test

* cleanup, doc

* update test

* changelog

* check null mat

* move mat del to private destructor

* add ogre's licenseheader

* set gbuffer visibility mask

* fix build

* fix camera control inside model bbox

* add test world

* change to drill in test

* changelog

* use ign math equal

* fix ray triangle intersection check in Scene::FirstContact function

* changelog

* update comment

* add return doxy

* camera.cc remove redundant Disconnect call

* changelog

* Close branch bullet_quiet8

* Close branch mouse_bbox_7

* Style tweaks -> pull request #2916

* style tweaks and a couple of extra checks

* Close branch ambient_occlusion_7_louise

* ignore object that has material using alpha rejection

* Close branch FixSetPositionForODEandBullet

* Close branch ray_triangle_7

* Close branch ambient_occlusion_7

* save files return

* Remove recordpath in testing

* Close branch logging_with_models_gazebo7
